content.rendered:
Luxury Homes Starting from  On Request*

TARC Kirti Nagar Project Overview:

Nestled in New Delhi’s upscale neighbourhood, TARC Kirti Nagar Delhi provides the pinnacle of safe and tranquil living combined with a thoughtful fusion of facilities and amenities. This project is the ideal location for a fresh start because of its lush natural surroundings that provide a welcome escape from the squalor of the city.

About The Luxurious Residential Apartments At TARC Kirti Nagar Delhi!

Numerous beautiful 3, and 4-bedroom homes situated across large acres in the opulent neighbourhood near Kirti Nagar Metro Station. A lot of open space and greenery with lots of amenities. the greatest Clubhouse for the discriminating residents of TARC Kirti Nagar to unwind and relax.

The elegant frontage of TARC Residenial Project In Delhi Dwellings adorned with strategically placed terraces and enormous, open galleries that command the attention of onlookers while boosting the inside-out experience for the residents. The unique cross-ventilation characteristics of the layouts allow the interiors of the individual homes to be flooded with natural light during the day and accentuated by pleasant breezes 24/7. While the building compound’s interior is open space, each apartment block is also laced with beautiful greenery and water features, providing its residents with an absolute haven of living space.

Type: Ultra-Luxurious Residential Project

Location: Kirti Nagar Delhi

Price: On Request

RERA: RERA Approved Township

Offer: Exclusive Discount

 

TARC Premium Flats – Best Location For Living!

Nighttime faceted lighting on the building’s exterior gives it an ethereal appearance, and its distinct verticality gives it the appearance of gracefully ascending to the heavens. So, as you enter the structures, a regal lobby in the center of the experience countryside podium opens out to peaceful surroundings, calming water features, attractive lawns, and lush foliage bordered by scented walks. Finally, enter the comfortable master bedroom, which also equipped with roomy walk-in closets, and settle into your haven of peace. A stunning 270° vista awaits as you soar across the beautiful mahogany floors and out onto the adjoining balcony. Celebrate right now since you have reached TARC Luxury Project In Kirti Nagar.

Elevators are also available in the building to give easy access to the flats. Each person’s demands taken into consideration when designing the floor plans of the TARC Apartments in Delhi. The huge bedroom in the one-bedroom units has a separate living and eating area. Since every apartment has a fully functional kitchen, preparing meals is simple and quick. So, the exterior of the building is stylish and attractive with a terrace overlooking the city skyline. For outdoor entertaining and living, the building also has a number of balconies. The luxury residential apartments of TARC Kirti Nagar Delhi also offers the ideal mix of contemporary lifestyle.

Why to invest in Delhi?

  • In the coming years, Delhi is one of the few places where real estate values are predicted to consistently rise.
  • Keeping the GDP growth rate constant at around 12.82% in 2018–19 (GSDP at current prices).
  • There are 4 flattened factory complexes and 29 authorized industrial regions in this city.
  • The biggest Indian metro train system. There are more than 285 stations connecting Delhi to Bahadurgarh, Gurgaon, Faridabad, Ghaziabad, Noida, and Greater Noida.
  • The region in India with the highest rate of urbanization, at 97.5%
  • Over 2453.37 MW of installed power capacity overall.
  • Greater job opportunities and a higher standard of living also offered by Fortune 100 companies in Gurgaon and Noida. Which are located near Delhi.

TARC Residential Project in Kirti Nagar Delhi

  • This location rewards you with the best social amenities and infrastructure around. This area is home to numerous administrative, commercial, and residential developments.
  • Reputable medical and educational facilities abound in the area. There are banquets, shopping centers, F&B establishments, and more. Shop to your heart’s content at Khan Market, the most popular shopping destination near Jhandenwalan Temple in Karol Bagh.
  • Rajouri Garden, Punjabi Bagh, Tagore Garden, Karol Bagh, and Kirti Nagar are some of the few neighbourhoods that shares boundaries with central west Delhi.
  • One great benefit for Kirti Nagar’s working professionals is having corporate spaces right outside their homes. Residents can live a worry-free lifestyle at TARC Kirti Nagar Delhi because of the significant time and money savings on travel.
  • It takes 15 to 20 minutes to get to other important Delhi landmarks, including the New Delhi Railway Station and the Indira Gandhi International Airport.
  • The previously mentioned localities offer a variety of activities and access to lifestyle destinations and upscale amenities.
  • Punjabi Bagh Club Road offers high-end retail stores, clubs, pubs, lounges, fitness centers, and cafes. Cafes, street food, lounges, shopping centers, Delhi Haat, and banquet halls can all be found in Netaji Subhash Place.
  • Rajouri Garden: First-rate spa & sauna, accessible wedding locations, renowned banquet spaces, restaurants serving a variety of cuisines, coffee shops, restobars, local eateries, lounges, and upscale shopping centers.

Location Advantage
Premium Residential Project Of
TARC Kirti Nagar in Delhi

Get in Touch with us...
